name: Sprarachnite
description:
This is a game I designed and programmed over the 2016 Winter break from college using the Unity game engine. The goal of the game is to eat as many bugs as possible. A bug must match a spider in color and symbol to be eaten by that spider. Eating a spiked bug, eating a bug with the wrong color/symbol, or letting five non-spiked bugs leave the right side of the screen result in a game over.

Credits:

Created by Jacob Stone

Art by Jacob Stone and Amanda Williams

Code by Jacob Stone

SFX by Jacob Stone

Music by Arielle Taylor
